info.title: Umbraco Delivery API
info.description: You can find out more about the Umbraco Delivery API in [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api).

parameters.name: fetch
parameters.description: Specifies the content items to fetch. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Defines how to filter the fetched content items. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Defines how to sort the found content items. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Specifies the number of found content items to skip. Use this to control pagination of the response.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Specifies the number of found content items to take. Use this to control pagination of the response.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Defines the properties that should be expanded in the response. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Explicitly defines which properties should be included in the response (by default all properties are included). Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Defines the language to return. Use this when querying language variant content items.

parameters.name: Accept-Segment
parameters.description: Defines the segment to return. Use this when querying segment variant content items.

parameters.name: Preview
parameters.description: Whether to request draft content.

parameters.name: Start-Item
parameters.description: URL segment or GUID of a root content item.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Defines the properties that should be expanded in the response. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Explicitly defines which properties should be included in the response (by default all properties are included). Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: fetch
parameters.description: Specifies the media items to fetch. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api/media-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: Defines how to filter the fetched media items. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api/media-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Defines how to sort the found media items. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api/media-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

parameters.name: skip
parameters.description: Specifies the number of found media items to skip. Use this to control pagination of the response.

parameters.name: take
parameters.description: Specifies the number of found media items to take. Use this to control pagination of the response.

parameters.name: expand
parameters.description: Defines the properties that should be expanded in the response. Refer to [the documentation](https://docs.umbraco.com/umbraco-cms/reference/content-delivery-api/media-delivery-api#query-parameters) for more details on this.

ApiKeyAuth.description: API key specified through configuration to authorize access to the API.
ApiKeyAuth.name: Api-Key
